code_General.utilities.files¶

Generic Backend

Thomas Skodawessely 2023

Contains: File upload helpers

Functions¶

deleteFileHelper(→ None)

Deletes the file from either the remote or the local storage if so desired and flagged

syncBytesioIterator(bytesio[, chunk_size])

Synchronous iterator for bytesio

asyncBytesioIterator(bytesio[, chunk_size])

Asynchronous iterator for bytesio

createFileResponse(→ django.http.FileResponse)

Create a file response for a given file and sync/async context

Module Contents¶

code_General.utilities.files.deleteFileHelper(fileContent: dict) → None¶

Deletes the file from either the remote or the local storage if so desired and flagged

Parameters:

fileContent (dict) – the file content object

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

code_General.utilities.files.syncBytesioIterator(bytesio: io.BytesIO, chunk_size: int = 8192)¶

Synchronous iterator for bytesio

Parameters:

  • bytesio (BytesIO) – a byte buffer object of what ever you want to stream (e.g. a file)

  • chunk_size (int) – size of iterator chunks

Returns:

sync iterator

Return type:

iterator

async code_General.utilities.files.asyncBytesioIterator(bytesio: io.BytesIO, chunk_size: int = 8192)¶

Asynchronous iterator for bytesio

Parameters:

  • bytesio (BytesIO) – a byte buffer object of what ever you want to stream (e.g. a file)

  • chunk_size (int) – sie of iterator chunks

Returns:

async iterator

Return type:

iterator

code_General.utilities.files.createFileResponse(bytesio: io.BytesIO, filename: str) → django.http.FileResponse¶

Create a file response for a given file and sync/async context

Parameters:

  • bytesio (BytesIO) – a file like object in BytesIO format

  • filename (str) – name of the file

Returns:

an FileResponse object with according async or sync iterator over the given bytesio object

Return type:

FileResponse
